languages.text: "Легко судить тому, кто не гнил здесь на протяжении долгих лет ожидания среди пылевых бурь, хищников — и безумцев пострашнее самих хищников. Но мы выжили и продолжаем делать все возможное и невозможное — силами тех, кто еще остался на этой планете, господин... магос".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Мы делаем все, что можем — силами тех, кто еще остался на этой клятой планете. Вы не гнили здесь на протяжении долгих лет ожидания. Не вам нас судить".

languages.text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."
languages.original_text: "Легко судить тому, кто не гнил здесь на протяжении долгих лет ожидания среди пылевых бурь, хищников — и безумцев пострашнее самих хищников. Но мы выжили и продолжаем делать все возможное и невозможное — силами тех, кто еще остался на этой планете, господин... магос".

traits.locale_text: "Easy it is to judge for one who has not rotted here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet we survived, and we still do all that can and cannot be done, with the strength of those few left on this world, my lord… Magos."
"We are doing everything we can — those of us still left on this blasted planet. You did not wait here for years, wasting away. You do not get to judge us."

"It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world, sir... Magos."

"It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world, sir... Magos."
"We are doing everything we can — those of us still left on this blasted planet. You did not have to wait here for years, wasting away. You do not get to judge us."
"We are doing everything we can — those of us still left on this blasted planet. You did not have to wait here for years, wasting away. You do not get to judge us."
"We are doing everything we can — those of us still left on this blasted planet. You did not have to wait here for years, wasting away. You do not get to judge us."

"Easy it is to judge for one who has not rotted here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet we survived, and we still do all that can and cannot be done, with the strength of those few left on this world, my lord… Magos."

languages.text: "Das lässt sich leicht sagen, wenn man hier nicht jahrelang verrottet ist und Staubstürme, Raubtiere und Verrückte ertragen hat, die schlimmer sind als jede Bestie. Und doch haben wir überlebt und tun alles Menschenmögliche und -unmögliche mittels der Stärke der Wenigen, die auf dieser Welt verblieben sind ... geschätzter Magos."
languages.original_text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."

traits.locale_text: "Das lässt sich leicht sagen, wenn man hier nicht jahrelang verrottet ist und Staubstürme, Raubtiere und Verrückte ertragen hat, die schlimmer sind als jede Bestie. Und doch haben wir überlebt und tun alles Menschenmögliche und -unmögliche mittels der Stärke der Wenigen, die auf dieser Welt verblieben sind ... geschätzter Magos."

languages.text: « Comme il est facile de juger, quand on n'a pas passé des années et des années à pourrir ici, au milieu des tempêtes, des prédateurs et de détraqués plus dangereux encore que les bêtes sauvages. En dépit de tout, nous avons survécu et nous continuons de réaliser l'impossible à la force des bras d'une poignée de survivants... vénérable magos. »
languages.original_text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il est facile de juger, quand on n'a pas passé des années et des années à pourrir ici, au milieu des tempêtes, des prédateurs et de détraqués plus dangereux encore que les bêtes sauvages. En dépit de tout, nous avons survécu et nous continuons de réaliser l'impossible à la force des bras d'une poignée de survivants... vénérable magos. »

languages.text: “某些人没有在这里枯等多年，也没有体验过在沙尘暴、掠食者，还有比怪物更危险的疯子之间慢慢熬烂的感觉，因此他们很容易对周围的一切评头论足。即便如此，我们还是活了下来。我们动员起极少数幸存者的力量，继续做着一切可能与不可能的事情……尊敬的贤者。”
languages.original_text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."

traits.locale_text: “某些人没有在这里枯等多年，也没有体验过在沙尘暴、掠食者，还有比怪物更危险的疯子之间慢慢熬烂的感觉，因此他们很容易对周围的一切评头论足。即便如此，我们还是活了下来。我们动员起极少数幸存者的力量，继续做着一切可能与不可能的事情……尊敬的贤者。”

languages.text: «Es fácil juzgar para alguien que no se ha podrido aquí durante años entre tormentas de polvo, depredadores y lunáticos a cuál peor. Pero hemos sobrevivido y hacemos todo lo posible e imposible con el poder de los pocos que quedamos en este planeta... estimado magos».
languages.original_text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."

traits.locale_text: «Es fácil juzgar para alguien que no se ha podrido aquí durante años entre tormentas de polvo, depredadores y lunáticos a cuál peor. Pero hemos sobrevivido y hacemos todo lo posible e imposible con el poder de los pocos que quedamos en este planeta... estimado magos».

languages.text: 「私たちはこの忌まわしい惑星に未だに留まって、できる限りのことをしています。あなたは何年もここで待ち続け、無為に過ごす必要はなかったのです。だから、私たちを裁く権利はあなたにはありません」
languages.original_text: "We are doing everything we can — those of us still left on this blasted planet. You did not have to wait here for years, wasting away. You do not get to judge us."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはこの忌まわしい惑星に未だに留まって、できる限りのことをしています。あなたは何年もここで待ち続け、無為に過ごす必要はなかったのです。だから、私たちを裁く権利はあなたにはありません」

languages.text: "Burada uzun yıllar toz fırtınaları, yırtıcı hayvanlar ve canavardan kötü sayılabilecek deliler arasında çürümeye mahkûm olmamışlar için yargılaması kolay. Biz bunlara rağmen hayatta kaldık, bu dünyada kalan az sayıdaki insanın gücüyle mümkün olan ve olmayan her şeyi yapmayı sürdürüyoruz... Saygıdeğer Magos."
languages.original_text: "It is easy to judge for one has not had to rot here through long years of waiting amidst dust storms, predators, and madmen worse than any beast. Yet, we survived, and we continue do all that is possible and impossible alike using the strength of the few that yet remain on this world... esteemed Magos."

traits.locale_text: "Burada uzun yıllar toz fırtınaları, yırtıcı hayvanlar ve canavardan kötü sayılabilecek deliler arasında çürümeye mahkûm olmamışlar için yargılaması kolay. Biz bunlara rağmen hayatta kaldık, bu dünyada kalan az sayıdaki insanın gücüyle mümkün olan ve olmayan her şeyi yapmayı sürdürüyoruz... Saygıdeğer Magos."
